org.takes.facets.auth

Interface Pass

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PsByFlag, PsChain, PsCookie, PsFacebook, PsGithub, PsLogout

    public interface Pass
    Inlet to enter a user.

    All implementations of this interface must be immutable and thread-safe.

    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@teamed.io)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Identity enter(Request request)
      Authenticate the user by the request.
      Response exit(Response response, Identity identity)
      Wrap the response with the user.

    • Method Detail

        Identity enter(Request request)
               throws IOException
        Authenticate the user by the request.
        Parameters:
        request - The request
        Returns:
        Identity of the user found
        Throws:
        IOException - If fails

            Identity identity)

        Throws:
